com.mygdx.game.assets

Class Assets

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.assets.Assets

  • public final class Assets
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all assets used in the game.

    • Field Detail

      • BATTLE_TEXTURES

        public static final java.lang.String[] BATTLE_TEXTURES
        List of battle textures to load. The index in the battleTextures array will be the same as the index in this array for each enemy.

      • loadWalkingTextures

        private static WalkingTextures loadWalkingTextures(java.lang.String prefix,
                                                   int width,
                                                   int height,
                                                   int frameCount,
                                                   float frameDuration)
        Loads a standard set of walking textures from the world folder.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the file prefix of the textures to load
        width - the width of each texture
        height - the height of each texture
        frameCount - the number of frames in the walking animations
        frameDuration - how long each frame in the walking animation should be displayed for
        Returns:
        the set of walking textures

      • loadBattleTextures

        private static BattleTextures loadBattleTextures(java.lang.String prefix,
                                                 int width,
                                                 int height)
        Loads a standard set of battle textures from the battle folder.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the file prefix of the textures to load
        width - the width of each texture
        height - the height of each texture
        Returns:
        the set of battle textures

      • loadTexture

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture loadTexture(java.lang.String file)
        Loads the texture from the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to load from
        Returns:
        the texture

      • loadAnimation

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation loadAnimation(java.lang.String file,
                                                                    int frameWidth,
                                                                    int frameHeight,
                                                                    int frameCount,
                                                                    float frameDuration)
        Loads the animation from the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to load from
        frameCount - how many frames are in the file
        frameWidth - how wide each frame is in the file
        frameHeight - how tall each frame is in the file
        frameDuration - how long each frame should be shown for in seconds
        Returns:
        the animation

      • loadAnimation

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation loadAnimation(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture,
                                                                    int frameWidth,
                                                                    int frameHeight,
                                                                    int frameCount,
                                                                    float frameDuration)
        Loads an animation from the specified texture.
        Parameters:
        texture - the texture to create from
        frameCount - how many frames are in the file
        frameWidth - how wide each frame is in the file
        frameHeight - how tall each frame is in the file
        frameDuration - how long each frame should be shown for in seconds
        Returns:
        the animation
